{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-C |revision=1 (1GB) Rev 0.3 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=Yes |manuf_rev= |availability=discontinued |price=35 |est_release_date=12/2014 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=2.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=0.8 |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S805 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=KB4G1646D-BCK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB VBUS Controller;On Semi;NCP380;;2; ,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1; ,,, Over-voltage, Over-current, Reverse-voltage Protection IC;On Semi;NPC372;;1; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, eMMC module connector, IR receiver, Micro HDMI out, RTC, GPIO, |stock_boot=U-Boot;00000;-ge7d4447-dirty; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.72;Ubuntu 14.04; |tp_firmware=Armbian |oui_eth=00:1E:06 }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-C1}} :[http://www.hardkernel.com/main/products/prdt_info.php?g_code=G141578608433 Product page] eMMC module connector with modules of 8, 16, 32 and 64GB available. {{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}} ===Links=== *{{WPLink|ODROID}} *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-c1/odroid-c1 ''ODROID-C1'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/12/10/hardkernel-odroid-c1-is-a-35-development-board-powered-by-amlogic-s805-quad-core-processor/ ''Hardkernel ODROID-C1 is a Development Board Powered
by Amlogic S805 Quad Core Processor'' on '''CNX|Software'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S805 @1.5GHz :SoC: Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A5) :GPU: Mali-400 MP2 @600MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :eMMC 4.5 connector *RAM: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM ===See also=== *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A5) CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A5) CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A5) CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @2.0GHz __NOTOC__
